startText: As a child of one of the owner of a very well known Jewelry Store, many know you as a very wealthy person with many valuable products. You hear a noise... someone broke into your house! You need to escape before they kill you! You also need to escape before with anything valuable so they don't steal it!
endText: CONGRATULATIONS! YOU ESCAPED! Thanks for playing!
